ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest16324: These shelves provide unique stat bonuses. They are useful when trying to reach very specific stats for infusion enchanting.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest32412: Aureal can also be automatically generated by replacing one of your pedestals with an arcane crystal obelisk.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest34289: Enhancer Relics are items you can place in your Hephaestus Forge to reduce its essence requirements, and allow you to craft certain items.
&7Found occasionally in loot chests inside of the dimensional dungeons.&r
&7Found occasionally in loot chests inside of Bastions.&r

&o&7If you are connected to a server, there exists an issue where you may not be able to see which Enhancer Relics are needed for a certain recipe. One of the rewards for this quest is a book which contains all the recipes and which Enhancer Relics are needed for them.
Each relic is obtained in a different way:
&7Found occasionally in loot chests inside of Pillager Outposts.&r
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest47940: You can place these decoration items around you Enchanting Table to also get stat bonuses (&oThese are just some examples&r).
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest58567: These bookshelves function the same as vanilla bookshelves and only provide 1 Eterna (up to a max of 15).
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest72215: A Blacksmith Gavel is required to start crafting an item using the Hephaestus Forge.
To start the craft, just interact with the Forge using the Gavel while all of the required items are on their pedestals and the Forge has the essence needed.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest74494: The Imbuement Chamber will allow you to &oimbue&r your items with source.
Some recipes require items to be placed on pedestals near the chamber, but these items will not be consumed.
The Imbuement Chamber does not require source to function, but placing a Source Jar with source inside will speed up the process.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest75516: The Enchanting Table, in addition to its base functionality, can now craft new items! Items can be infused in the Enchanting Table if specific Eterna, Quanta, and Arcana requirements are met. You can check the specific requirements of an item by viewing its recipe in JEI.
There are many different types of bookshelves which all provide different amounts of each stat. Infusing items is a process of deciding which shelves you need to use.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest81961: The Hephaestus Forge is a structure that can craft items using essences (aureal, souls, blood, and experience). The Forge can be filled with essences by placing items in it (see the associated quests to see which items can provide essence).
The base of the Forge is made like this:

Once you have made the base, place a Smithing Table on the center block and interact with it using Mundabitur Dust. That will cause the Smithing Table to transform into the Hephaestus Forge. To use items in the crafting recipe, just place Darkstone Pedestals on top of the base and interact with them to add items.
You should end up with something like this:
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest84782: The Hephaestus Forge can be upgraded the same way you craft items with it. Each upgrade allows you to craft higher-tier items.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.title: Rituals
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_i_eyes_of_ende: Each eye has two different options on how to craft it. Each option will use different ingredients and a different workstation.
Which recipe you want to use is up to you.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_iii_the_afterm: Now you can place your own at home!
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest148: After some time has passed, you may notice a hole form on the Wither Storm's body. To enter the final phase, you will need to enter from that hole.
You can use whatever method you like to get inside, but the mod includes the ability to launch ender pearls using a crossbow in case you cannot fly there.
Once you're inside, use the weapon you just made to destroy the Command Block. Once and for all!
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest286: You will need to craft some command block tools in a Smithing Table in order to kill it for good. This means you need to get &oanother&r Enchanted Command Block Book along with a Withered Smithing Template.
&7&oThe Gateway of the Tainted Village summons a Withered Symbiont for its final wave, meaning you can get another Enchanted Command Block Book by also getting the needed smithing template.&r
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest290: After some time, the Wither Storm may summon a mini-boss called the &5Withered Symbiont&r. Defeat it to get a Command Block Book and craft the Formidi-Bomb.
Use the Formidi-Bomb to blow up the Wither Storm!
&7&oThis will only work once the Storm has reached the appropriate phase, make sure to check using the Phasometer.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest399: This item is needed to craft the Command Block, and you can only find it in advanced dimensional dungeons.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest499: All three of these items would be very helpful when fighting the Wither Storm.
&nThe Amulet&r will allow you to track the Storm's distance from you.
&nThe Phasometer&r will let you see the current phase it is on.
&nGolden Apple Stew&r cures wither sickness, a disease that lowers the max health of entities while the storm is still alive.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest526: The portal for the Dimensional Dungeons is made like this:
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest530: To use advanced portal keys you will need to upgrade your portal. The pattern on the banners does not matter, as long as they are either purple or white banners (The Ominous Banner uses a white banner as its base, so it is also usable).
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest567: With the Command Block, you can now unleash its power and summon the Wither Storm.
The Wither Storm is a long and destructive battle; you should prepare.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest596: One of two items needed for crafting a Command Block.
&7&oYou can duplicate Unobtanium by crafting it into a block and back into an ingot. That way, you only need to use its more convoluted recipe once.&r
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest612: To craft the weapon you need, you will need the Withered Smithing Template, which can only be obtained by defeating all of the summoned mobs from the Gate Pearl -
This Gate Pearl is crafted at the Summoning Altar as well, so you will need to go back to it.
&7&o(You cannot prepare for this beforehand, as you cannot craft the Gate Pearl until you have summoned the Wither Storm)&r
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest622: To summon the Wither Storm, you will need to use the Summoning Altar.
I recommend using an altar that is not close to your base...
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest756: These aren't needed until the end-game, but they have some rituals which may be useful before then.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.quest851: You can either inscribe keys using the Key Inscribing Station block or an End Portal Frame block.
ftbquests.chapter.command_block.title: Chapter II: Command Block
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest10378949: The Skillet, with a heat source underneath, will allow you to cook items like on a campfire.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest31256733: Use the fishing net on kelp and seagrass for a chance to find shrimp.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest39042237: You only get one of these, and it breaks quickly when using bonemeal (unbreaking won't help).
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest50048766: The Cooking Pot is where you will make most foods. To use it, all you need to do is place a valid heat source underneath the pot.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest52288386: To make cheese, you first need to craft a curd block with some milk buckets and sugar/honey.
If you place it in a low-light environment, it will turn into a cheese wheel eventually.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest52578679: You can use the Grapevine Pot to create grape juice by placing grapes inside and stomping on them.
Then, the juices can be used to 'fuel' the Fermentation Barrel and allow you to create different types of wine.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest58619826: You only get one of these, and it breaks quickly when using bonemeal (unbreaking won't help).
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest59438825: You only get one of these, and it breaks quickly when using bonemeal (unbreaking won't help).
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest63377312: Certain ingredients will only be dropped by mobs when you kill them with a knife.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest69249292: There are &l384&r different foods you can eat which contribute to adding bonus health. Every 16 unique foods you eat adds one permanent bonus heart, up to a total of 24 bonus hearts (&omore than two extra rows of hearts!&r).

But to get the maximum amount of bonus hearts, you will have to eat &lall&r 320 of them. Most of the foods listed on this page contribute to this, but not all of them do. You are able to tell if a food will contribute to bonus health if it has the tooltip:
&3Not yet eaten! What does it taste like?
This is where the &eFood Book&r becomes useful because it will keep track of which foods you have eaten and which ones you are still missing.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest73859792: You can obtain this by crafting every type of wine available in the mod.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest76100632: Feasts are a special type of food that need to be placed in the world before they can be eaten.
All of them contribute to your bonus hearts.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest84474245: The Cutting Board is where you'll prepare most of your ingredients. To use it, you just need to place the ingredient on the board and use the required tool on it (usually a knife).
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest88830778: You only get one of these, and it breaks quickly when using bonemeal (unbreaking won't help).
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.quest91258417: Above, there are some foods that will contribute to bonus health and are relatively simple to make, so they are a good place to start.
ftbquests.chapter.cookbook.title: Cookbook
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1308364847: You are only able to power your ME network with rotational power using the Energy Provider.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1594496842: Made by condensing any 64 items in a Matter Condenser.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6167473693: You can use the command &7/create ponder&r to view the ponder index anytime.
This works in survival without cheats enabled too.
Learn How to Use Create Machines
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8510712701: Item and Fluid cells both store a large amount of their respective items, but have a limit on how many different types of items they can hold.
DISK cells do not have a type limit.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8768452353: Made by condensing any 256 items in a Matter Condenser.
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: Machines
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest13871: Defeat the Wither Storm, once and for all.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest17589: Complete these specific advancements in this order to get some very useful accessories.
Technically, you can complete these out of order, but you won't get any rewards until all quests before it are completed
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest22760: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest25578: Find an advanced portal key in a dungeon.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest32652: Welcome to your first dimensional dungeon.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest37483: Successfully defend a village from a raid.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest71075: Put down a cooking pot and start preparing meals!
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest74585: Build, light, and enter a nether portal.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest79168: Now you can finally use all your cards at once!
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest86836: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest86900: Summon the Wither Storm, a mutated wither capable of mass destruction.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest88238: Enchant an item at an Enchantment Table.
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.quest90043: Open 50 instanced, per-player loot containers and collect your rewards!
ftbquests.chapter.tarot_cards.title: The Fool's Journey
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest112683606945: By placing down compost on the ground outside, it will eventually turn into rich soil. This will take a while, so I recommend doing other things while it decomposes.
Rich soil is very useful because it accelerates crop growth. Rich soil farmland also cannot be trampled.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest117827054335: An early game inventory management tool.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest118235168651: By using this block, you can control which painting you will get when you place one down.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest155951137675: These blocks will match the appearance of any block you interact on them with.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest164103192606: You can use the Enchanting Apparatus to enchant items manually using source and materials instead of xp levels.
In this modpack, every enchantment has a recipe in the Enchanting Apparatus.
Consult the Ars Nouveau guidebook (&oWorn Notebook&r) for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest186294520974: This is a longer lasting and reusable form of the Girl Power effect.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest229154909952: The effect these items give will allow you to dash very quickly and a pretty long distance. This is a very powerful mobility option.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest248436107675: You can display items on the label by shift + right-clicking on them with an item.
You can also open chests, barrels, etc. by clicking through them!
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest275996503203: Stores experience levels safely. Also used to power other machines from the Cognition mod. To connect it to other machines, use the staff of attunement.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest306256460278: Can only capture animal entities inside.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest314401455393: This item allows you to search your world for basically anything you would need.
It is very useful, but also very expensive.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest357930423952: Wearing these will make you immune to fall damage!
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest395306414504: These items will allow you to recolor certain dyeable blocks in-world.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest455530676128: The Gate Pearls will allow you to recieve lots of loot for killing waves of enemies.
You can see which enemies they summon, the loot you can recieve, and more by reading the tooltip of each pearl.
All of the pearls are crafted at the Summoning Altar.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest514073992180: With this, you can store all of your enchanted books in one place for convinient access.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest519068612693: These blocks will match the appearance of any block you interact on them with.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest520040907402: To use these portals, place them in the world. Then right-click on it with an empty hand.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest535789545610: You can only carry 2 backpacks at a time normally, but if you equip one of these items, you are able to carry 1 more. You can equip multiple of these to increase the effect.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest554485555262: If you push your pet onto a Pet Bed and 'Z' particles appear, then your pet has set their respawn point.
Now, if your pet ever dies, they will respawn the next day at that bed.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest561099025271: This block is the wood equivalent of a stonecutter.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest594237492172: This block is fueled by amethyst and it allows you to set the appearance of any item to match that of any other item.
When used in the Transmogrification Table, the Void Fragment will make an item completely invisible.
These changes are only visual and don't affect the appearance of an item in the inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest668446290311: This item is extremely useful for building because it allows you to extend the face of a group of blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest704474335427: These hammers will mine out multiple blocks at a time. You can craft upgraded versions of these hammers which mine more blocks at once for a much higher cost.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest737067904295: These accessories can only be found in chests and have powerful skills which can be leveled up.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest781574526573: If you have lots of different types of food you want to eat, you can put them all in a Lunch Basket to carry around with you!
Left-click/punch with the Lunch Basket to open or close it.
When &eopen&r, right-click to eat the currently selected food.
When &eclosed&r, right-click and scroll to select a food inside the basket.
&7&oIt should be noted that foods eaten from the lunch basket do not count towards your bonus health.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest789895577239: This block will automatically generate stone blocks if you give it some rotational force.
Click on this block with any of the supported stone types to set the block that will be generated.
The speed in which stone is generated depends on the strength of the supplied rotational force.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest804930792705: This flower can create any enchanted book you want if it is fed experience and/or honey items.
It can only be placed on top of other crystal blocks.
It is only found in the Hanging Garden structure in the Bumblezone.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest821081805831: These aren't needed until the end-game, but they have some rituals which may be useful before then.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest911326333302: Here you will find many useful blocks and items.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.quest939784063931: A more immersive minimap option for those who want it.
ftbquests.chapter.tips.title: Tips
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest29104159: Get some useful items, or some less-than-useful items.
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest32966462: Some very useful items to get you going
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest45132730: All of these maps will work only in the Overworld.
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest54907378: This item will reset your insomnia and therefore reset phantom spawning.
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest60512426: These biomes only generate in the Overworld.
&7&o(Except for the Deep Dark, which also generates in the Depths)
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest67334259: Each of these items will contribute to earning bonus health.
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest68612339: Choose a sapling with a wood color you like!
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest69116615: These are acheology structures, so bring your brush!
All of these structures can be found in the Overworld.
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.quest88073007: 90%% Stop before they hit it big! Don't let that be you!
ftbquests.chapter.trinkets.title: Shop
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest16205092: Obtain The Essence of the Bees!
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest32508938: Trophies are decorative and collectible items which can be obtained from the questbook.
Most trophies are found from loot crates which are purchased using various materials. The trophies are divided into various seperate &ocollections&r, each with their own trophies and odds.
There are also some trophies which are given out as rewards for completing certain tasks. These are less common.
By the way, there is no need to collect them &oall&r; there is no reward for doing that, so just grab as many as you want.
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest37489514: This chapter also contains a few hidden rewards for engaging with some optional content.
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest42739725: Obtain All of the Mangrove Planks!
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest63069277: Collect All of the Cataclysm Music Discs!
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.quest75189503: Submit any unwanted trophies here for a small compensation.
ftbquests.chapter.trophies.title: Trophies
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quest122752399: I'm glad you decided to play Insurgence!
- Default keybinds for some mods have changed &7(&osee next page&r&7)&r
- The Spyglass you recieved upon joining can be equipped and used with the default keybind. &7&o(Z)
I decided to change &osome&r of the default keybinds to improve the out-of-the-box experience. Of course, feel free to change them back or to whatever else you want.
These are the changes I've made:
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quest135082303: Plenty of mods offer in-game documentation in the form of guidebooks.
I'm keeping them here so that they don't clutter up your inventory until you're ready to recieve them.
They will be here until then.
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quest469066218: This will allow you to run a command to disable the Twilight Forest's progression system. If you did not do so during world creation.
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quest656525068: Here you can choose to enable or disable the dynamic lights implemented by Ars Nouveau.
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.title: Welcome
